types, private/util

Consts

typeWoff = (mime: (typ: "application", subType: "font-woff",
                   value: "application/font-woff"), extension: "woff")
typeWoff2 = (mime: (typ: "application", subType: "font-woff",
                    value: "application/font-woff"), extension: "woff2")
typeTtf = (mime: (typ: "application", subType: "font-sfnt",
                  value: "application/font-sfnt"), extension: "ttf")
typeOtf = (mime: (typ: "application", subType: "font-sfnt",
                  value: "application/font-sfnt"), extension: "otf")
fontMatcher = [((mime: (typ: "application", subType: "font-woff",
                        value: "application/font-woff"), extension: "woff"),
                isWoff), ((mime: (typ: "application", subType: "font-woff",
                                  value: "application/font-woff"),
                           extension: "woff2"), isWoff2), ((mime: (
    typ: "application", subType: "font-sfnt", value: "application/font-sfnt"),
    extension: "ttf"), isTtf), ((mime: (typ: "application",
                                        subType: "font-sfnt",
                                        value: "application/font-sfnt"),
                                 extension: "otf"), isOtf)]
